Activation functions between network layers

Source: R/param_activation.R
activation.Rd

Activation functions between network layers

activation(values = values_activation)

values_activation

Arguments

values

A character string of possible values. See values_activation in examples below.

Format

An object of class character of length 4.

Details

This parameter is used in parsnip models for neural networks such as parsnip:::mlp().

Examples

values_activation
#> [1] "linear"  "softmax" "relu"    "elu"    
activation()
#> Activation Function  (qualitative)
#> 4 possible value include:
#> 'linear', 'softmax', 'relu' and 'elu'

Contents

dials is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.
